wikipedia_page.main: Donald Archibald "Archie" MacDonald  (23 February 1895 – 5 May 1965) was a British wrestler who competed in the 1920 Summer Olympics and the 1924 Summer Olympics. In 1924, at the 1924 Summer Olympics, he won the bronze medal in the freestyle wrestling heavyweight class.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1920 Summer Olympics
Great Britain at the 1924 Summer Olympics

response: * Archie MacDonald, a fictional character in the BBC TV series Monarch of the Glen

link_mentions.page: Wrestling at the 1924 Summer Olympics – Men's freestyle heavyweight
response: As Nilsson, Richthoff, and Dame declined to compete, Archie MacDonald was awarded the bronze medal.
